original_text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this fellow also was with him: for he is a Galilaean.
korean_text: 한 시간쯤 있다가 또 한 사람이 장담하여 이르되 이는 갈릴리 사람이니 참으로 그와 함께 있었느니라

sentences.original_text: And about the space of one hour after
Of a truth this fellow also was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 진실로 이 사람도 그와 함께 있었으니
